description: Supervised practicum course to develop professional skills in applied psychology. Theories and techniques are applied in the specialist area within Counselling psychology. There is a possibility that students may be required to undertake site workshops prior to placements and these workshops may incur a fee which is payable to the placement provider.
prerequisites: Provisional or full registration as a Psychologist with the Psychology Board of Australia.
restricted: Restricted to MAppPsych, MPsych, GDPsyPrac students or with the permission of Director of the Master of Psychology program
